meanings.definition: Displaying something in a showy or ostentatious manner.
meanings.sent1: The flaunting jewelry caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She was flaunting her new dress at the party.
meanings.sent3: The peacock was flaunting its colorful feathers for all to see.
meanings.sent4: The city lights were flaunting their brightness against the dark sky.
meanings.sent5: The extravagant mansion was flaunting its grandeur to passersby.

meanings.definition: Showing off in a boastful or proud way.
meanings.sent1: His flaunting behavior annoyed his classmates.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was flaunting his trophy to the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The cat was flaunting its hunting skills by bringing home a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The storm was flaunting its power with loud thunder and lightning.
meanings.sent5: The peacock flaunted its vibrant feathers in the zoo.
